attributes.action: Reform the British Empire! Increase military spending! God save the queen!
attributes.additional_details: The British army is small in comparison to our allies with only around 80,000 regular soldiers and provisions for 4 months of sustained attrition! The nation is on the brink of war and we are unprepared, our allies have superior armour, troop and aircraft numbers as well as a larger navy! As well as this Britain has gone from being a great Empire to a nation with a gaggle of overseas territories without enough soldiers to effectively defend its waters! Something needs to be done!
attributes.background: I want the government to democratically begin reforming the British empire as well as increase military spending and recruiting to aid in the potential future conflicts…

rejection.details:
The British Empire no longer exists, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Substantially increase defence spending and the size of the Armed Forces: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609579

Increase Defence Spending to at least 3% of the United Kingdom’s GDP: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619184
